VALIDATION_ERRORS.NUMBER_MAXIMUM: {{viewValue}} is greater than the allowed maximum of {{schema.maximum}}

VALIDATION_ERRORS.STRING_LENGTH_LONG: String is too long ({{viewValue.length}} characters), maximum {{schema.maxLength}}
